title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A classic novel set in the 1930s that explores racial injustice and the loss of innocence.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian society controlled by the government's surveillance and manipulation.

description: A non-fiction book that explores the history and impact of Homo sapiens, covering the cognitive, agricultural, and scientific revolutions.

author: J.K. Rowling
description: The first book in the popular Harry Potter series, in which a young wizard discovers his magical heritage and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
